description:
This used to work but now it compalins about a --doctest option that is being passed to it:

$ ./run_tests.sh -pep8
Running PEP8 and HACKING compliance check...
Usage: pep8 [options] input ...

pep8: error: no such option: --doctest
title: ./run_tests.sh -pep8 no longer works
